content:
ShutdownMode Enum

Definition

Specifies how an application will shutdown. Used by the stem.Windows.Application.ShutdownMode* property.

In this Article

public enum ShutdownMode
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
ShutdownMode

Fields

OnExplicitShutdown

An application shuts down only when stem.Windows.Application.Shutdown* is called.
OnLastWindowClose

An application shuts down when either the last window closes, or stem.Windows.Application.Shutdown* is called.
OnMainWindowClose

An application shuts down when either the main window closes, or stem.Windows.Application.Shutdown* is called.
